column4: What is the name of the program i can download to see all my processes that are running when i' shift-alt-f1-6 ? not window(s) but the task manager that shows me my processes ? please help ... got a frozen buntu gui

What is the name of the program i can download to see all my processes that are running when i' shift-alt-f1-6 ? not window(s) but the task manager that shows me my processes ? please help ... got a frozen buntu gui
are you referring to the "ps" program, perhaps?
correct, top will not kill processes.
